column2: "Thank you, <%me>. I can always count on you to accept my requests."
"It appears these crystals may be related to the electrical discharge you observed before."
"The phenomenon of those crystals sometimes furling up into the atmosphere can be confirmed, but have you seen it?"
"That's what I want you to observe. Please collect as much data as you can."
"I hate to bother you again, but I'll be looking forward to your findings. Thank you."
